product_name: WTB i23 29er Tubeless Compatible Rear Wheel
long_description: Designed for 29er mountain bikes, the WTB i23 29er Tubeless Compatible Rear Wheel can be used with tubeless tires and converted to a thru-axle setup for excellent off-road performance.
short_description: Designed for 29er mountain bikes, the WTB i23 29er Tubeless Compatible Rear Wheel can be used with tubeless tires and converted to a thru-axle setup for excellent off-road performance.
